content.raw:
Yep, that was it, thanks! I was tricked by the output of `./ign-gazebo --help`:

    ign-gazebo -- Run the Gazebo server and GUI.
    
    `ign-gazebo` [options] <world_file>

which implies that you can simply add the world file name after the options.

Also, I tried loading the world from inside `ign-gazebo` using the file selection dialog box, but that also failed to load anything. If that feature isn’t working yet, we may want to have it at least print a warning message that it’s not implemented.
content.html:
Yep, that was it, thanks! I was tricked by the output of ./ign-gazebo --help:

ign-gazebo -- Run the Gazebo server and GUI.

`ign-gazebo` [options] <world_file>

which implies that you can simply add the world file name after the options.

Also, I tried loading the world from inside ign-gazebo using the file selection dialog box, but that also failed to load anything. If that feature isn’t working yet, we may want to have it at least print a warning message that it’s not implemented.
